code: import React from'react';import{useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{toggleCountdownModal,toggleGameContent,resetGame,playBackgroundSound}from'../../store/gameSlice';import'../Header/Header.css';import takashimayaLogo from'../../assets/img/general/logo.png';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Header=()=>{const dispatch=useDispatch();const startGame=()=>{dispatch(resetGame(true));dispatch(playBackgroundSound());dispatch(toggleGameContent(false));dispatch(toggleCountdownModal(true));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{className:"header-site",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"navbar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container header-item-list",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#home-page",className:"takashimaya-header-logo",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:takashimayaLogo,alt:"Takashimaya-logo"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:"nav",id:"header-navbar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{className:"nav-link",onClick:startGame,href:"#play-page",children:"Play game"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{className:"nav-link",href:"#rules-page",children:"Rules"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{className:"nav-link",href:"#prize-page",children:"Prize"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{className:"nav-link",href:"#rank-page",children:"Rank"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{className:"nav-link",href:"#setting-page",children:"Setting"})})]})]})})});};export default Header;
